item.title: Website
item.description: Not a front end developer. But this is something I grew up with. Here is my collection of few random websites/blogs from yester years. Old Porfolio Website Previous design of this website 2012-2018. techxcode Another blogspot experiment in 2014. The Computer Wizards Blogspot based tech blog 2013. g8write Second attempt to blog in 2012. niharwrite My First blog 2011.
